About.Our Story Content: At AdOnline.in, our journey began with a simple idea: to create a platform that connects people, businesses, and opportunities. We envisioned a space where classified ads could thrive, where buyers and sellers could find each other effortlessly, and where communities could come together.
About.What We Offer Content Part 1: Our mission is to empower individuals and businesses by providing a seamless and efficient classified experience. Whether you're looking to buy, sell, or explore, AdOnline.in is your go-to destination. From real estate and jobs to services and events, we've got you covered.
About.What We Offer Content Part 2: AdOnline.in has been created with a simple yet highly effective purpose: to connect people in need. Our commitment is to make this platform user-friendly for everyone. Not only do we market on our website, but we also extend our reach to platforms like Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, and Telegram.

Why Choose Us Content.Transparency: Transparency: We believe in openness and honesty. Our platform ensures transparency in every transaction.
Why Choose Us Content.User-Centric: User-Centric: You, our users, are at the heart of everything we do. We're committed to enhancing your experience.
Why Choose Us Content.Quality Listings: Quality Listings: We curate high-quality listings to ensure you find what you're looking for quickly and easily.
Why Choose Us Content.Community: Community: AdOnline.in is more than a website; it's a community. Join us in shaping the future of classifieds.

About.Meet Our Team Content: Behind the scenes, a dedicated team works tirelessly to make AdOnline.in a reality. We're passionate about connecting people and creating value. Our dedicated team has put immense effort into creating a sleek and elegant design. The success of this initiative rests on the minds of expert software programmers.
About.Get in Touch Content: Have questions? Want to collaborate? Reach out to usâ€”we'd love to hear from you! Feel free to customize this content to align with your brand's unique voice and vision. If you need further assistance, don't hesitate to ask.

Pricing.WelcomeDescription: We offer very cheap and flexible pricing plans to meet your needs. TechAvidus Private Limited has built this application so when you add funds, payment will be transferred to the account of TechAvidus Private Limited. When you add any advertisement (ad), it will deduct the amount from your balance based on the pricing below.
Pricing.FreeAdsDescription: We offer one free ad per week.
Pricing.PaidAdsDescription: After the free ad, rates will increase by 100 Points for each subsequent ad. For example, the second ad of the week will cost you 100 Points, the third ad will cost you 200 Points, and so on.
Pricing.ContactUsDescription: If you have any questions, please contact us on our helpline number

Terms.Welcome: Welcome to AdOnline.in! By accessing and using our website, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.
Terms.AcceptanceOfTermsDescription: By using our website, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and accepted these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please refrain from using our services.
Terms.UserConductProhibitedActivities: You agree not to engage in any prohibited activities, including but not limited to:
Terms.UserConductLaws: Violating any applicable laws or regulations.
Terms.UserConductFalseContent: Posting false, misleading, or harmful content.
Terms.UserConductImpersonation: Impersonating others or misrepresenting your identity.
Terms.UserConductInterference: Interfering with the functionality of the website.
Terms.UserConductAccountTermination: We reserve the right to terminate your account if you violate these terms.
Terms.IntellectualPropertyDescription: All content on AdOnline.in, including text, images, logos, and trademarks, is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute our content without our explicit permission.
Terms.LimitationOfLiabilityDescription: We strive to provide accurate information, but we do not guarantee the completeness, reliability, or timeliness of the content. We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our website.
Terms.DisputeResolutionDescription: Any disputes arising from your use of AdOnline.in shall be resolved through negotiation or mediation. If resolution is not possible, you agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Gandhinagar.
Terms.ChangesToTermsDescription: We may update these terms periodically. Any changes will be posted on our website. Continued use of our services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.
Terms.ContactUsDescription: If you have any questions or concerns regarding these terms, please contact us on helpline number

PrivacyPolicy.Welcome: Welcome to AdOnline.in! We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, share, and safeguard your data. Please read it carefully.
PrivacyPolicy.InformationWeCollectDescription: We collect various types of information, including: Personal information (name and phone number) provided voluntarily by users. Non-personal information (such as browser type, IP address, device information) collected automatically through cookies and other tracking technologies.
PrivacyPolicy.HowWeUseYourInformation1: To improve our services and enhance user experience.
PrivacyPolicy.HowWeUseYourInformation2: To communicate with you regarding your inquiries, requests, or account-related matters.
PrivacyPolicy.HowWeUseYourInformation3: To personalize content and provide relevant recommendations.
PrivacyPolicy.DataSharingAndDisclosure1: Service providers who assist us in operating our website.
PrivacyPolicy.DataSharingAndDisclosure2: Legal authorities when required by law.
PrivacyPolicy.CookiesAndTrackingTechnologiesDescriptio: We use cookies and similar technologies to collect non-personal information. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
PrivacyPolicy.YourRights1: Access and update your personal information.
PrivacyPolicy.SecurityMeasuresDescription: We take reasonable steps to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
PrivacyPolicy.ChangesToThisPrivacyPolicyDescription: We may update this policy periodically. Any changes will be posted on our website.
PrivacyPolicy.ContactUsDescription: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please contact us at helpline number
PrivacyPolicy.RememberToReplace: Remember to replace the placeholders (such as email address and website name) with your actual details. If you need further assistance, feel free to ask!

RefundPolicy.Welcome: Welcome to AdOnline.in! By using our services, you agree to comply with the following refund policy. Please read it carefully.

RefundingRules.Title: 1. Refunding Rules
RefundingRules.Description: does not offer refunds for services we offer. All sales are final, and once a subscription is made, it cannot be reversed.

AmountDeducted.Title: 2. Amount Deducted but does not reflect on AdOnline.in
AmountDeducted.Item1: If your payment is not reflected on AdOnline.in, but the amount has been deducted from your account, please contact our helpline immediately on +91 81608 45612
AmountDeducted.Item2: Provide relevant details such as order number and transaction ID.
AmountDeducted.Item3: We will investigate and resolve the issue promptly.

ChangesToPolicy.Title: 3. Changes to this Policy
ChangesToPolicy.Description: We reserve the right to modify the terms of this refund policy at any time without notice.

ContactUs.Title: 4. Contact Us
ContactUs.Description: If you have any questions or concerns regarding refund policy, please contact us on helpline number +91 81608 45612

DeleteAccount.Title: Delete
DeleteAccount.ConfirmationQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
DeleteAccount.WarningMessage: We're sorry to see you go. Once your account is deleted, all of your content will be permanently gone, including your profile, post, wallet money. Are you sure about that?

FirstWeeklyAd.Title: First Weekly Ad:
FirstWeeklyAd.Description: One ad is free per week. If you post another ad in the same week you will be charged per ad.

SubsequentAds.Title: Subsequent Ads in the Same Week:
SubsequentAds.Description: We count the week from Monday to Sunday. So you get a free ad every Monday and you can post that ad for free anytime that week

ResetWeekly.Title: Reset Weekly:
ResetWeekly.Description: More than one advertisement in a week: Each advertisement more than one in a week will be charged. Ads posted in a week X Ad Charge = Total Amount

hightlightText.Title: Reset Weekly:
hightlightText.Description: If you highlight the ad, the highlight charges will be extra.
